import re

def clear_line_breaks(string):
    string = string.replace('', ' ')
    string = re.sub('^\\s+|\\s+$', '', string, flags=re.MULTILINE)
    return string

import re

def clear_line_breaks(string):
    string = string.replace('\n', '')
    string = re.sub('^\\s+|\\s+$', '', string, flags=re.MULTILINE)
    return string

import re

def clear_line_breaks(string):
    string = string.replace('\n', ' ')
    string = re.sub('', '', string, flags=re.MULTILINE)
    return string

import re

def clear_line_breaks(string):
    string = string.replace('\n', ' ')
    string = re.sub('^\\s+|\\s+$', 'MUTATED', string, flags=re.MULTILINE)
    return string
